title: Beijing Day 5 - Drupal Tour 2016
body:
With the return of the activity in Beijing after their last festival, the quality of air is getting worst and worst, but I am here, and I have to try to go out to see the city and places around. So, my last stop was at the Summer Palace.

The summer palace is located about one hour from Beijing downtown, are an enormous place with a lot of trails, pavilion, temples, canals and houses. The only problem is that everything is situated on a hill, therefore, a lot of stairs.



In the other side of the hill there a lake, I skip the tour in the lake due the view wasnâ€™t good due the quality of air, maybe in summer is better.
